content: Shower or bathe frequently. Dirty, greasy hair and stinky, sweaty skin won’t help you look or feel naturally beautiful. Make sure you shower or bathe on a regular basis, such as every day or every other day. Wash your body and face to remove dirt, sweat, oil, and body odor. shampoo and condition your hair as well, using products formulated specifically for your hair type. [1] You don’t have to wash your hair every single day—you can simply rinse it and skip the shampoo every other time you shower to help preserve your hair’s natural oils. Don’t forget to apply deodorant after showering! Cleanse your face daily. It’s important to wash your face every day to remove dirt and oil, even if you don’t take a shower. Remember to choose a cleanser formulated for your skin type. If you have oily skin, choose an oil-free face wash. For acne-prone skin, look for a product with salicylic acid. If you have dry skin, use a cream cleanser to add some moisture. For combination skin, try a gel cleanser. [2] Moisturize your skin. Applying moisturizer after your shower will help keep your skin supple, soft, and glowing. Choose a lotion formulated for your skin type, and avoid using anything with heavy perfumes or harsh chemicals, which can dry out your skin. Look for products with humectants like glycerin, occlusives such as lanolin, and emollients like lauric acid. [3] Brush and floss your teeth every day. A bright, white smile is sure to help you look beautiful! You should brush your teeth at least twice a day, and floss once per day. Doing so will keep your teeth and gums healthy. Aim to brush for 2 minutes each time. You can also use mouthwash to kill germs and freshen your breath. [4] To whiten your teeth, opt for a whitening toothpaste or use whitening strips. Exfoliate and moisturize your hands and feet. Ragged cuticles or rough, flaky heels can be easily fixed to help you look and feel more naturally beautiful. One option is to get regular manicures and pedicures in a salon. If you’d rather take care of your nails at home, trim and file them regularly to keep them short and smooth. Exfoliate your hands and feet to remove dead, dry skin, then apply a moisturizer after drying them off. [5] You can also do at-home paraffin wax treatments on your hands or feet for smooth, hydrated skin. Apply sunscreen before going outside. The best thing you can do for your skin is to protect it from the sun. Wear sunscreen with UV protection and an SPF of at least 30 whenever you plan to be outdoors. Sunscreen can prevent wrinkles as well as sun damage that could lead to cancer. You can also wear light-colored, lightweight clothing outdoors and a wide-brimmed hat with sunglasses. [6] Use lip balm to keep your lips soft and smooth. Dry, cracked lips are painful and unsightly. Keep your lips soft and smooth with the regular use of lip balm. Choose one that has sunscreen in it to protect your lips. It’s a good idea to buy several of your favorite kind so you can stash them in places like your purse or pocket, your car, and your office. [7] Wear clean clothes that fit well. A comfortable, put-together outfit will help you feel more confident than a rumpled, stinky sweatsuit. Wash your laundry frequently and put your clothes away so you always have clean, unwrinkled clothes to wear. You don’t have to dress up, just pick things that make you feel good and that are free of stains or rips. [8] Choose clothes that fit well; they shouldn’t be baggy and shapeless nor should they be constricting and uncomfortable. Choose simple accessories. If you’re going for a natural look, don’t overdo it with tons of flashy jewelry or blinged-out accessories. Stick to simple accessories and limit it to just a few items, like a patterned scarf, simple bracelet, and bright-colored heels. Or, you could choose some dangly earrings, a neutral handbag, and patterned flats. [9] Find a hairstyle that suits you. Visit a reputable hair stylist and ask them what kind of styles they would suggest for your face shape and hair type. Work together to choose a style that matches your preferred level of effort to style, whether you enjoy spending time styling your hair in the morning or are more of a wash-and-go type of person. Then, learn how to style it each day and pick up the products you may need. [10] Trim your hair every 6-8 weeks to remove split ends and keep your hair healthy and beautiful. Apply natural-looking makeup , if desired. If you choose to wear makeup, it should be understated and subtly highlight your features. Choose a tinted moisturizer or a lightweight foundation and be sure to blend it into your hairline and onto your neck. Sweep a warm blush over your cheekbones and apply a lipstick or lipgloss that’s only a few shades from your natural lip color. Accent your eyes with mascara and perhaps a neutral shade of eyeshadow. [11] Always remove your makeup before bed! It’s super crucial that you don’t sleep in your makeup. Not only will it smudge and smear, it can also clog your pores and cause breakouts. [12] Eat a healthy, balanced diet . Eating healthy food will help you look and feel great! Choose lean proteins, like chicken and fish, and eat a variety of fresh fruits and vegetables every day. Aim to eat several different colors of fruits and veggies each day, like carrots, beets, bananas, kale, blueberries, bell peppers, brussels sprouts, strawberries, kiwi, green beans, and pineapple. Try to indulge in salty and sugary snacks, like chips and candy, very sparingly. [13] Drink 8 8-ounce glasses of water each day. Drinking plenty of water allows your body to flush out toxins. It will also help you achieve healthy hair and skin with a radiant glow! Carry around a refillable water bottle so that you can drink water throughout the day and on the go. You can even add cucumbers, lemons, or berries to your water to flavor it, if you want. Just keep sipping and stay hydrated. [14] Exercise at least 3 times per week. Regular exercise helps you sweat out toxins, clears your pores, and improves blood circulation, all of which will give you a healthy glow. Try to exercise for 30-60 minutes at least 3 times a week. You can swim , do zumba , lift weights, jog , do yoga , or engage in any other kind of physical activity you like. Find something that is fun, but still challenging. [15] Aim for 7-8 hours of sleep each night. A full night’s rest will keep your skin looking great, and can actually help prevent wrinkles! If you want to look naturally beautiful, be sure to get 7-8 hours of sleep each night. It’s not called “beauty rest” for nothing! [16] Smile and project confidence. A smile is a beautiful thing! Smiling at people attracts them to you, and also helps you feel happier. Even if you don’t feel confident, you can still act like you do . Use good posture—stand up straight and avoid crossing your arms or fidgeting. Look people in the eye, shake hands firmly, and speak slowly and clearly. [17]

<h1 class="firstHeading no_toc"><a href="https://www.wikihow.com/Look-Naturally-Beautiful">How to Look Naturally Beautiful</a></h1>
<div class="" id="expert_coauthor">
	
	Co-authored by <a class="staff_icon expert_coauthor_link" href="#article_info_section">
		wikiHow Staff</a><span class="ss_pipe">|</span><a class="expert_coauthor_link ss_review" href="#article_info_section">Reader-Approved</a>

</div>

This article has over 1,892,659 views, and 86% of readers who voted found it helpful. It also received 24 testimonials from readers, earning it our reader-approved status.
		<a class="sp_learn_more_link" href="/wikiHow:About-wikiHow#Why_should_you_choose_wikiHow_first.3F_sub">Learn more...</a>
</div>
</div>
<p>You don’t need to spend a lot of time and effort to look naturally beautiful! Just take the time to groom yourself so you look and feel fresh and clean. Then, style and present yourself in a way that makes you feel comfortable and confident. Incorporating healthy habits into your routine can also help achieve natural beauty. You’ll be looking and feeling great in no time!</p>

<a class="anchor" name="Creating_a_Grooming_Routine_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky steps_first">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>1</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Creating_a_Grooming_Routine">Creating a Grooming Routine</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_1">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-1-Version-9.jpg?ajax=true&aid=35948" href="#/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-1-Version-9.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/56/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-1-Version-9.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-1-Version-9.jpg" height="410" id="img_d29867c2d1" onload="WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_d29867c2d1')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" height="410" onload="WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/56/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-1-Version-9.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-1-Version-9.jpg" width="728"/></noscript>
<script>WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');</script></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Shower or bathe frequently.</b> Dirty, greasy hair and stinky, sweaty skin won’t help you look or feel naturally beautiful. Make sure you shower or bathe on a regular basis, such as every day or every other day. Wash your body and face to remove dirt, sweat, oil, and body odor. <a href="/Shampoo-Your-Hair" title="Shampoo Your Hair">shampoo</a> and <a href="/Apply-Conditioner-to-Your-Hair" title="Apply Conditioner to Your Hair">condition</a> your hair as well, using products formulated specifically for your hair type.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 1" class="reference" id="_ref-1"><a href="#_note-1">[1]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>You don’t have to wash your hair every single day—you can simply rinse it and skip the shampoo every other time you shower to help preserve your hair’s natural oils.</li>
<li>Don’t forget to apply deodorant after showering!</li>
</ul>
<script>WH.performance.mark('step1_rendered');</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatright" style="max-width:728px"><div class="content-spacer" style="padding-top: 56.25%;"><div class="video-player">
<div class="video-container content-fill"><video class="m-video content-fill" controlslist="nodownload" data-controls="1" data-giffirstsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/1/12/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-2-Version-5.360p.first.gif" data-gifsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/ec/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-2-Version-5.360p.gif" data-poster="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/bc/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-2-Version-9.jpg/550px-nowatermark-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-2-Version-9.jpg" data-src="/b/bb/Look Naturally Beautiful Step 2 Version 5.360p.mp4" data-watermark="1" id="mvid-ce8955dcd0" loop="" muted="" playsinline="" webkit-playsinline=""></video></div>
<div class="m-video-controls"><div class="m-video-play-old"></div></div>
<div class="m-video-wm" data-wm-title-text="to Look Naturally Beautiful"><img class="m-video-wm-img" src="/skins/WikiHow/images/WH_logo.svg"/></div>
</div></div></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Cleanse your face daily.</b> It’s important to wash your face every day to remove dirt and oil, even if you don’t take a shower. Remember to choose a cleanser formulated for your skin type. If you have oily skin, choose an oil-free face wash. For acne-prone skin, look for a product with salicylic acid. If you have dry skin, use a cream cleanser to add some moisture. For combination skin, try a gel cleanser.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 2" class="reference" id="_ref-2"><a href="#_note-2">[2]</a></sup><script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
if (WH.video)WH.video.add(document.getElementById('mvid-ce8955dcd0'));
//]]>
</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatright" style="max-width:728px"><div class="content-spacer" style="padding-top: 56.25%;"><div class="video-player">
<div class="video-container content-fill"><video class="m-video content-fill" controlslist="nodownload" data-controls="1" data-giffirstsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/9/93/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-3-Version-5.360p.first.gif" data-gifsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/1/1f/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-3-Version-5.360p.gif" data-poster="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f6/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-3-Version-9.jpg/550px-nowatermark-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-3-Version-9.jpg" data-src="/b/b9/Look Naturally Beautiful Step 3 Version 5.360p.mp4" data-watermark="1" id="mvid-8d284da9f2" loop="" muted="" playsinline="" webkit-playsinline=""></video></div>
<div class="m-video-controls"><div class="m-video-play-old"></div></div>
<div class="m-video-wm" data-wm-title-text="to Look Naturally Beautiful"><img class="m-video-wm-img" src="/skins/WikiHow/images/WH_logo.svg"/></div>
</div></div></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Moisturize your skin.</b> Applying moisturizer after your shower will help keep your skin supple, soft, and glowing. Choose a lotion formulated for your skin type, and avoid using anything with heavy perfumes or harsh chemicals, which can dry out your skin. Look for products with humectants like glycerin, occlusives such as lanolin, and emollients like lauric acid.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 3" class="reference" id="_ref-3"><a href="#_note-3">[3]</a></sup><script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
if (WH.video)WH.video.add(document.getElementById('mvid-8d284da9f2'));
//]]>
</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-4-Version-9.jpg?ajax=true&aid=35948" href="#/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-4-Version-9.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 4" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/ae/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-4-Version-9.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-4-Version-9.jpg" height="410" id="img_474068cf81" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_474068cf81')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 4" class="whcdn content-fill" height="410" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/ae/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-4-Version-9.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-4-Version-9.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Brush and floss your teeth every day.</b> A bright, white smile is sure to help you look beautiful! You should brush your teeth at least twice a day, and floss once per day. Doing so will keep your teeth and gums healthy. Aim to brush for 2 minutes each time. You can also use mouthwash to kill germs and freshen your breath.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 4" class="reference" id="_ref-4"><a href="#_note-4">[4]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>To whiten your teeth, opt for a whitening toothpaste or use whitening strips.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatright" style="max-width:728px"><div class="content-spacer" style="padding-top: 56.25%;"><div class="video-player">
<div class="video-container content-fill"><video class="m-video content-fill" controlslist="nodownload" data-controls="1" data-giffirstsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e9/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-5-Version-5.360p.first.gif" data-gifsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/f/ff/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-5-Version-5.360p.gif" data-poster="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a3/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-5-Version-8.jpg/550px-nowatermark-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-5-Version-8.jpg" data-src="/c/ca/Look Naturally Beautiful Step 5 Version 5.360p.mp4" data-watermark="1" id="mvid-2900d9230c" loop="" muted="" playsinline="" webkit-playsinline=""></video></div>
<div class="m-video-controls"><div class="m-video-play-old"></div></div>
<div class="m-video-wm" data-wm-title-text="to Look Naturally Beautiful"><img class="m-video-wm-img" src="/skins/WikiHow/images/WH_logo.svg"/></div>
</div></div></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Exfoliate and moisturize your hands and feet.</b> Ragged cuticles or rough, flaky heels can be easily fixed to help you look and feel more naturally beautiful. One option is to get regular manicures and pedicures in a salon. If you’d rather take care of your nails at home, trim and file them regularly to keep them short and smooth. Exfoliate your hands and feet to remove dead, dry skin, then apply a moisturizer after drying them off.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 5" class="reference" id="_ref-5"><a href="#_note-5">[5]</a></sup><script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
if (WH.video)WH.video.add(document.getElementById('mvid-2900d9230c'));
//]]>
</script>
<ul>
<li>You can also do at-home paraffin wax treatments on your hands or feet for smooth, hydrated skin.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatright" style="max-width:728px"><div class="content-spacer" style="padding-top: 56.25%;"><div class="video-player">
<div class="video-container content-fill"><video class="m-video content-fill" controlslist="nodownload" data-controls="1" data-giffirstsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/52/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-6-Version-2.360p.first.gif" data-gifsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/8/8f/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-6-Version-2.360p.gif" data-poster="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/01/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-6-Version-8.jpg/550px-nowatermark-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-6-Version-8.jpg" data-src="/7/76/Look Naturally Beautiful Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4" data-watermark="1" id="mvid-8155a0f64a" loop="" muted="" playsinline="" webkit-playsinline=""></video></div>
<div class="m-video-controls"><div class="m-video-play-old"></div></div>
<div class="m-video-wm" data-wm-title-text="to Look Naturally Beautiful"><img class="m-video-wm-img" src="/skins/WikiHow/images/WH_logo.svg"/></div>
</div></div></div>
<div aria-label="Step 6" class="step_num">6</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_6"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Apply sunscreen before going outside.</b> The best thing you can do for your skin is to protect it from the sun. Wear sunscreen with UV protection and an SPF of at least 30 whenever you plan to be outdoors. Sunscreen can prevent wrinkles as well as sun damage that could lead to cancer. You can also wear light-colored, lightweight clothing outdoors and a wide-brimmed hat with sunglasses.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 6" class="reference" id="_ref-6"><a href="#_note-6">[6]</a></sup><script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
if (WH.video)WH.video.add(document.getElementById('mvid-8155a0f64a'));
//]]>
</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatright" style="max-width:728px"><div class="content-spacer" style="padding-top: 56.25%;"><div class="video-player">
<div class="video-container content-fill"><video class="m-video content-fill" controlslist="nodownload" data-controls="1" data-giffirstsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/a0/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-7-Version-5.360p.first.gif" data-gifsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/47/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-7-Version-5.360p.gif" data-poster="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7a/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-7-Version-8.jpg/550px-nowatermark-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-7-Version-8.jpg" data-src="/7/73/Look Naturally Beautiful Step 7 Version 5.360p.mp4" data-watermark="1" id="mvid-998d0eaf3e" loop="" muted="" playsinline="" webkit-playsinline=""></video></div>
<div class="m-video-controls"><div class="m-video-play-old"></div></div>
<div class="m-video-wm" data-wm-title-text="to Look Naturally Beautiful"><img class="m-video-wm-img" src="/skins/WikiHow/images/WH_logo.svg"/></div>
</div></div></div>
<div aria-label="Step 7" class="step_num">7</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_7"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Use lip balm to keep your lips soft and smooth.</b> Dry, cracked lips are painful and unsightly. Keep your lips soft and smooth with the regular use of lip balm. Choose one that has sunscreen in it to protect your lips. It’s a good idea to buy several of your favorite kind so you can stash them in places like your purse or pocket, your car, and your office.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 7" class="reference" id="_ref-7"><a href="#_note-7">[7]</a></sup><script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
if (WH.video)WH.video.add(document.getElementById('mvid-998d0eaf3e'));
//]]>
</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
<div class="wh_ad_inner step_ad" data-adsenseheight="90" data-adsensewidth="728" data-adtargetid="methodad" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-apsload="1" data-channels="6381149051,3492389196" data-lateload="0" data-loaded="0" data-service="dfp" data-slot="" data-viewablerefresh="1">
<div id="methodad"></div>
<script>googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('methodad'); });</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addBodyAd('methodad')</script>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Styling_Yourself_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>2</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Styling_Yourself">Styling Yourself</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_2">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-8-Version-8.jpg?ajax=true&aid=35948" href="#/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-8-Version-8.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 8" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/04/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-8-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-8-Version-8.jpg" height="410" id="img_f26495a9f5" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_f26495a9f5')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 8" class="whcdn content-fill" height="410" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/04/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-8-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-8-Version-8.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Wear <a href="/Wash-Your-Clothes" title="Wash Your Clothes">clean clothes</a> that fit well.</b> A comfortable, put-together outfit will help you feel more confident than a rumpled, stinky sweatsuit. Wash your laundry frequently and put your clothes away so you always have clean, unwrinkled clothes to wear. You don’t have to dress up, just pick things that make you feel good and that are free of stains or rips.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 8" class="reference" id="_ref-8"><a href="#_note-8">[8]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>Choose clothes that fit well; they shouldn’t be baggy and shapeless nor should they be constricting and uncomfortable.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-9-Version-8.jpg?ajax=true&aid=35948" href="#/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-9-Version-8.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 9" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a3/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-9-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-9-Version-8.jpg" height="410" id="img_5903fad060" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_5903fad060')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 9" class="whcdn content-fill" height="410" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a3/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-9-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-9-Version-8.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Choose simple accessories.</b> If you’re going for a natural look, don’t overdo it with tons of flashy jewelry or blinged-out accessories. Stick to simple accessories and limit it to just a few items, like a patterned scarf, simple bracelet, and bright-colored heels. Or, you could choose some dangly earrings, a neutral handbag, and patterned flats.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 9" class="reference" id="_ref-9"><a href="#_note-9">[9]</a></sup>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatright" style="max-width:728px"><div class="content-spacer" style="padding-top: 56.25%;"><div class="video-player">
<div class="video-container content-fill"><video class="m-video content-fill" controlslist="nodownload" data-controls="1" data-giffirstsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/55/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-10-Version-2.360p.first.gif" data-gifsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/f/f1/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-10-Version-2.360p.gif" data-poster="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/50/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-10-Version-8.jpg/550px-nowatermark-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-10-Version-8.jpg" data-src="/8/87/Look Naturally Beautiful Step 10 Version 2.360p.mp4" data-watermark="1" id="mvid-c3a74b8759" loop="" muted="" playsinline="" webkit-playsinline=""></video></div>
<div class="m-video-controls"><div class="m-video-play-old"></div></div>
<div class="m-video-wm" data-wm-title-text="to Look Naturally Beautiful"><img class="m-video-wm-img" src="/skins/WikiHow/images/WH_logo.svg"/></div>
</div></div></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Find a hairstyle that suits you.</b> Visit a reputable hair stylist and ask them what kind of styles they would suggest for your face shape and hair type. Work together to choose a style that matches your preferred level of effort to style, whether you enjoy spending time styling your hair in the morning or are more of a wash-and-go type of person. Then, learn how to style it each day and pick up the products you may need.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 10" class="reference" id="_ref-10"><a href="#_note-10">[10]</a></sup><script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
if (WH.video)WH.video.add(document.getElementById('mvid-c3a74b8759'));
//]]>
</script>
<ul>
<li>Trim your hair every 6-8 weeks to remove split ends and keep your hair healthy and beautiful.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatright" style="max-width:728px"><div class="content-spacer" style="padding-top: 56.25%;"><div class="video-player">
<div class="video-container content-fill"><video class="m-video content-fill" controlslist="nodownload" data-controls="1" data-giffirstsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/6c/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-11-Version-5.360p.first.gif" data-gifsrc="https://www.wikihow.com/images/3/30/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-11-Version-5.360p.gif" data-poster="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/8d/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-11-Version-8.jpg/550px-nowatermark-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-11-Version-8.jpg" data-src="/4/44/Look Naturally Beautiful Step 11 Version 5.360p.mp4" data-watermark="1" id="mvid-ef7a331ddd" loop="" muted="" playsinline="" webkit-playsinline=""></video></div>
<div class="m-video-controls"><div class="m-video-play-old"></div></div>
<div class="m-video-wm" data-wm-title-text="to Look Naturally Beautiful"><img class="m-video-wm-img" src="/skins/WikiHow/images/WH_logo.svg"/></div>
</div></div></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Apply <a href="/Apply-Makeup-for-a-Natural-Look" title="Apply Makeup for a Natural Look">natural-looking makeup</a>, if desired.</b> If you choose to wear makeup, it should be understated and subtly highlight your features. Choose a tinted moisturizer or a lightweight foundation and be sure to blend it into your hairline and onto your neck. Sweep a warm blush over your cheekbones and apply a lipstick or lipgloss that’s only a few shades from your natural lip color. Accent your eyes with mascara and perhaps a neutral shade of eyeshadow.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 11" class="reference" id="_ref-11"><a href="#_note-11">[11]</a></sup><script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
if (WH.video)WH.video.add(document.getElementById('mvid-ef7a331ddd'));
//]]>
</script>
<ul>
<li>Always <a href="/Remove-Makeup" title="Remove Makeup">remove your makeup</a> before bed! It’s super crucial that you don’t sleep in your makeup. Not only will it smudge and smear, it can also clog your pores and cause breakouts.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 12" class="reference" id="_ref-12"><a href="#_note-12">[12]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
<div id="tocad_wrap">
<div class="wh_ad_inner step_ad" data-adsenseheight="90" data-adsensewidth="728" data-adtargetid="tocad" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-channels="6381149051,3492389196" data-lateload="1" data-loaded="0" data-service="adsense" data-slot="3356467874" data-viewablerefresh="1" id="tocad_outer"><div class="step_ad" id="tocad"></div></div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addTOCAd('tocad')</script>
</div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Developing_Healthy_Habits_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>3</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Developing_Healthy_Habits">Developing Healthy Habits</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_3">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-12-Version-8.jpg?ajax=true&aid=35948" href="#/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-12-Version-8.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 12" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b4/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-12-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-12-Version-8.jpg" height="410" id="img_4d6d92b376" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_4d6d92b376')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 12" class="whcdn content-fill" height="410" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b4/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-12-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-12-Version-8.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Eat a <a href="/Eat-Healthy" title="Eat Healthy">healthy, balanced diet</a>.</b> Eating healthy food will help you look and feel great! Choose lean proteins, like chicken and fish, and eat a variety of fresh fruits and vegetables every day. Aim to eat several different colors of fruits and veggies each day, like carrots, beets, bananas, kale, blueberries, bell peppers, brussels sprouts, strawberries, kiwi, green beans, and pineapple. Try to indulge in salty and sugary snacks, like chips and candy, very sparingly.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 13" class="reference" id="_ref-13"><a href="#_note-13">[13]</a></sup>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-13-Version-8.jpg?ajax=true&aid=35948" href="#/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-13-Version-8.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 13" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2d/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-13-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-13-Version-8.jpg" height="410" id="img_af2d743ce0" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_af2d743ce0')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 13" class="whcdn content-fill" height="410" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2d/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-13-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-13-Version-8.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Drink <a href="/Stay-Hydrated" title="Stay Hydrated">8 8-ounce glasses of water</a> each day.</b> Drinking plenty of water allows your body to flush out toxins. It will also help you achieve healthy hair and skin with a radiant glow! Carry around a refillable water bottle so that you can drink water throughout the day and on the go. You can even add cucumbers, lemons, or berries to your water to flavor it, if you want. Just keep sipping and stay hydrated.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 14" class="reference" id="_ref-14"><a href="#_note-14">[14]</a></sup>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-14-Version-8.jpg?ajax=true&aid=35948" href="#/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-14-Version-8.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 14" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/39/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-14-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-14-Version-8.jpg" height="410" id="img_62027dfcda" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_62027dfcda')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 14" class="whcdn content-fill" height="410" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/39/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-14-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-14-Version-8.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><a href="/Exercise" title="Exercise">Exercise</a> at least 3 times per week.</b> Regular exercise helps you sweat out toxins, clears your pores, and improves blood circulation, all of which will give you a healthy glow. Try to exercise for 30-60 minutes at least 3 times a week. You can <a href="/Swim" title="Swim">swim</a>, <a href="/Zumba" title="Zumba">do zumba</a>, lift weights, <a href="/Jog" title="Jog">jog</a>, <a href="/Do-Yoga" title="Do Yoga">do yoga</a>, or engage in any other kind of physical activity you like. Find something that is fun, but still challenging.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 15" class="reference" id="_ref-15"><a href="#_note-15">[15]</a></sup>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-15-Version-8.jpg?ajax=true&aid=35948" href="#/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-15-Version-8.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 15" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/ac/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-15-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-15-Version-8.jpg" height="410" id="img_f05b8b750f" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_f05b8b750f')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 15" class="whcdn content-fill" height="410" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/ac/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-15-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-15-Version-8.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Aim for <a href="/Improve-Your-Beauty-Sleep" title="Improve Your Beauty Sleep">7-8 hours of sleep</a> each night.</b> A full night’s rest will keep your skin looking great, and can actually help prevent wrinkles! If you want to look naturally beautiful, be sure to get 7-8 hours of sleep each night. It’s not called “beauty rest” for nothing!<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 16" class="reference" id="_ref-16"><a href="#_note-16">[16]</a></sup>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage final_li">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-16-Version-8.jpg?ajax=true&aid=35948" href="#/Image:Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-16-Version-8.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 16" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6b/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-16-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-16-Version-8.jpg" height="410" id="img_2faa84606e" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_2faa84606e')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Naturally Beautiful Step 16" class="whcdn content-fill" height="410" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6b/Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-16-Version-8.jpg/aid35948-v4-728px-Look-Naturally-Beautiful-Step-16-Version-8.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Smile and project confidence.</b> A smile is a beautiful thing! Smiling at people attracts them to you, and also helps you feel happier. Even if you don’t feel confident, you can still <a href="/Make-People-Think-You-Are-Confident" title="Make People Think You Are Confident">act like you do</a>. Use good posture—stand up straight and avoid crossing your arms or fidgeting. Look people in the eye, shake hands firmly, and speak slowly and clearly.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 17" class="reference" id="_ref-17"><a href="#_note-17">[17]</a></sup>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="qa section sticky qa_show_unanswered_questions" data-aid="35948" data-few_contribs="1" data-search_enabled="0">
<h2>
<div class="altblock"></div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="qa_headline">Community Q&A</span>
</h2>
<div class="section_text" id="qa">
<div id="qa_answered_questions_container">
<div id="qa_aq_search_container">
<div class="qa_section_heading" id="qa_aq_search_heading">Search</div>

</div>

<ul class="qa_questions qa_aqs qa_waittheresmore" id="qa_article_questions">
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="337035" data-caid="337908" data-cqid="337052" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1497441" data-submitter_id="2769285" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="11" data-votes_up="136">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">I am a 13-year-old girl. What kind of makeup would I wear to make myself look natural, but really beautiful as well?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_ta_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle" style="background-image:url(https://www.wikihow.com/images/avatarOut/7/7a/2769285.jpg?20190123084018)"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"><span class="qa_user_link" data-href="/User:KingQuails">Amy Harrison</span></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Top Answerer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">Avoid heavy makeup at 13, especially if you're going for a natural beauty look. Try a light BB cream or concealer. Avoid eye shadow, eyeliner and lipstick, as these are considered glam makeup products.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>11</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>136</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="337034" data-caid="337907" data-cqid="337051" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1525732" data-submitter_id="2769285" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="10" data-votes_up="112">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">What if I'm fat and ugly no matter what I do? </div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_ta_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle" style="background-image:url(https://www.wikihow.com/images/avatarOut/7/7a/2769285.jpg?20190123084018)"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"><span class="qa_user_link" data-href="/User:KingQuails">Amy Harrison</span></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Top Answerer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">If you put yourself down, then you will find it very difficult to be confident in your own body. If you're struggling to come to terms with your weight, then you can try adjusting your wardrobe with some tricks to appear slimmer. This is includes wearing certain outfits and garments. You can also work your way to a slimmer body by adjusting your diet and exercise.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>10</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>112</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="337036" data-caid="337909" data-cqid="337053" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1425925" data-submitter_id="2769285" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="9" data-votes_up="84">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">How am I supposed to get rid of a bunch of yellow stuff on my teeth overnight?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_ta_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle" style="background-image:url(https://www.wikihow.com/images/avatarOut/7/7a/2769285.jpg?20190123084018)"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"><span class="qa_user_link" data-href="/User:KingQuails">Amy Harrison</span></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Top Answerer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">Try a new toothpaste that is designed to whiten your teeth. Avoid going for the cheap stuff. There are whitening kits you can purchase to whiten your teeth. However, you must understand that whitening doesn't happen overnight. It will take a few weeks for you to notice changes. You also need to brush your teeth for at least two minutes. Avoid staining foods such as coffee or wine.  </div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>9</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>84</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="525318" data-caid="526191" data-cqid="525335" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="761736" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="0" data-votes_up="10">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">How do I keep my face from being oily?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">As a person with oily skin, there is no way to keep it from being oily entirely. However, if you wash and cleanse your face regularly, it can reduce the oil. If it gets too bad, there are sheets called "blotting paper" which you can carry with you that can soak up the oil mid-day. </div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>0</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>10</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="524834" data-caid="525707" data-cqid="524851" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="2075171" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="0" data-votes_up="8">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">What is the best face wash for oily skin?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">I have oily-combination skin and I use a combination of a medium to strong cleanser coupled with toner and oil-free moisturizer in the morning and again at night. When I need a refresher, I do a face mask, but if you do this too often it will dry you out too much. For acne, a retinoid cream is best. Apply it to the affected areas before moisturizer. </div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>0</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>8</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="528155" data-caid="529028" data-cqid="528172" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="146012" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="0" data-votes_up="8">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">What can I eat to get healthy skin?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">A diet consisting of lots of Vitamin C (citrus fruits, green veggies) and antioxidants (berries, dark chocolate) and drinking lots of water will help support a glow.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">

<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>0</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>8</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="524322" data-caid="525195" data-cqid="524339" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1104841" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="2" data-votes_up="10">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">How do I look naturally beautiful if I am overweight?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">You do not need to be skinny to be beautiful. Work on your self-confidence. Wear natural makeup and wear comfortable clothes that accentuate your best qualities. </div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">

<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="539482" data-caid="540355" data-cqid="539499" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="2443670" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="0" data-votes_up="4">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">How can I look naturally beautiful if I am not allowed to wear makeup?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">Use an eyelash curler and lip balm, which will give you a naturally beautiful look. Try a new hairstyle as well. You don't need makeup to be beautiful.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">

<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>

<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>4</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="525285" data-caid="526158" data-cqid="525302" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1383729" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="3" data-votes_up="7">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">How do I improve my skin color?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">If you want lighter skin, rub some lemon juice on your face and let it stay for about 10 minutes before washing it off. If you want darker skin, try to get a natural tan from the sun or use spray tan.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>

</div>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="525872" data-caid="526745" data-cqid="525889" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="634619" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="1" data-votes_up="4">

<div class="qa_li_container">

<div class="qa_answer answer">You should wear any outfit that makes you feel confident and good about yourself.</div>

<div class="section tips sticky">
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Tips">Tips</span></h2>
<div class="section_text" id="tips">
<ul>
<li>Don't worry and rush around so much! Take at least ten minutes a day to do something you find relaxing.</li>
<li>Avoid makeup that contains a lot of chemicals. Instead, choose natural products and use them sparingly.</li>
<li>Putting petroleum jelly or castor oil on your eyelashes (and eyebrows, if necessary) every night for a month or more will condition them, helping them to grow more and shine.</li>
<li>If you want to hide dark circles under your eyes, try putting a little bit of zinc oxide cream over them and <i>gently</i> blend it in.</li>
<li>Believe that you are naturally beautiful. Everyone is different, so instead of changing yourself, bring out your best parts. To do this, you must really get to know yourself and respect yourself!</li>
<li>If you are really young convince your parents that your ready start little then work your way up.</li>
<li>Take your time and always keep taking care of yourself. Plus, don’t stress too much as it is proven to cause breakouts.</li>
</ul>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>

title: How to Look Naturally Beautiful
content_html:
Shower or bathe frequently. Dirty, greasy hair and stinky, sweaty skin won’t help you look or feel naturally beautiful. Make sure you shower or bathe on a regular basis, such as every day or every other day. Wash your body and face to remove dirt, sweat, oil, and body odor. shampoo and condition your hair as well, using products formulated specifically for your hair type.[1]
  • You don’t have to wash your hair every single day—you can simply rinse it and skip the shampoo every other time you shower to help preserve your hair’s natural oils.
  • Don’t forget to apply deodorant after showering!
Cleanse your face daily. It’s important to wash your face every day to remove dirt and oil, even if you don’t take a shower. Remember to choose a cleanser formulated for your skin type. If you have oily skin, choose an oil-free face wash. For acne-prone skin, look for a product with salicylic acid. If you have dry skin, use a cream cleanser to add some moisture. For combination skin, try a gel cleanser.[2]
Moisturize your skin. Applying moisturizer after your shower will help keep your skin supple, soft, and glowing. Choose a lotion formulated for your skin type, and avoid using anything with heavy perfumes or harsh chemicals, which can dry out your skin. Look for products with humectants like glycerin, occlusives such as lanolin, and emollients like lauric acid.[3]
Brush and floss your teeth every day. A bright, white smile is sure to help you look beautiful! You should brush your teeth at least twice a day, and floss once per day. Doing so will keep your teeth and gums healthy. Aim to brush for 2 minutes each time. You can also use mouthwash to kill germs and freshen your breath.[4]
  • To whiten your teeth, opt for a whitening toothpaste or use whitening strips.
Exfoliate and moisturize your hands and feet. Ragged cuticles or rough, flaky heels can be easily fixed to help you look and feel more naturally beautiful. One option is to get regular manicures and pedicures in a salon. If you’d rather take care of your nails at home, trim and file them regularly to keep them short and smooth. Exfoliate your hands and feet to remove dead, dry skin, then apply a moisturizer after drying them off.[5]
  • You can also do at-home paraffin wax treatments on your hands or feet for smooth, hydrated skin.
Apply sunscreen before going outside. The best thing you can do for your skin is to protect it from the sun. Wear sunscreen with UV protection and an SPF of at least 30 whenever you plan to be outdoors. Sunscreen can prevent wrinkles as well as sun damage that could lead to cancer. You can also wear light-colored, lightweight clothing outdoors and a wide-brimmed hat with sunglasses.[6]
Use lip balm to keep your lips soft and smooth. Dry, cracked lips are painful and unsightly. Keep your lips soft and smooth with the regular use of lip balm. Choose one that has sunscreen in it to protect your lips. It’s a good idea to buy several of your favorite kind so you can stash them in places like your purse or pocket, your car, and your office.[7]
Wear clean clothes that fit well. A comfortable, put-together outfit will help you feel more confident than a rumpled, stinky sweatsuit. Wash your laundry frequently and put your clothes away so you always have clean, unwrinkled clothes to wear. You don’t have to dress up, just pick things that make you feel good and that are free of stains or rips.[8]
  • Choose clothes that fit well; they shouldn’t be baggy and shapeless nor should they be constricting and uncomfortable.
Choose simple accessories. If you’re going for a natural look, don’t overdo it with tons of flashy jewelry or blinged-out accessories. Stick to simple accessories and limit it to just a few items, like a patterned scarf, simple bracelet, and bright-colored heels. Or, you could choose some dangly earrings, a neutral handbag, and patterned flats.[9]
Find a hairstyle that suits you. Visit a reputable hair stylist and ask them what kind of styles they would suggest for your face shape and hair type. Work together to choose a style that matches your preferred level of effort to style, whether you enjoy spending time styling your hair in the morning or are more of a wash-and-go type of person. Then, learn how to style it each day and pick up the products you may need.[10]
  • Trim your hair every 6-8 weeks to remove split ends and keep your hair healthy and beautiful.
Apply natural-looking makeup, if desired. If you choose to wear makeup, it should be understated and subtly highlight your features. Choose a tinted moisturizer or a lightweight foundation and be sure to blend it into your hairline and onto your neck. Sweep a warm blush over your cheekbones and apply a lipstick or lipgloss that’s only a few shades from your natural lip color. Accent your eyes with mascara and perhaps a neutral shade of eyeshadow.[11]
  • Always remove your makeup before bed! It’s super crucial that you don’t sleep in your makeup. Not only will it smudge and smear, it can also clog your pores and cause breakouts.[12]
Eat a healthy, balanced diet. Eating healthy food will help you look and feel great! Choose lean proteins, like chicken and fish, and eat a variety of fresh fruits and vegetables every day. Aim to eat several different colors of fruits and veggies each day, like carrots, beets, bananas, kale, blueberries, bell peppers, brussels sprouts, strawberries, kiwi, green beans, and pineapple. Try to indulge in salty and sugary snacks, like chips and candy, very sparingly.[13]
Drink 8 8-ounce glasses of water each day. Drinking plenty of water allows your body to flush out toxins. It will also help you achieve healthy hair and skin with a radiant glow! Carry around a refillable water bottle so that you can drink water throughout the day and on the go. You can even add cucumbers, lemons, or berries to your water to flavor it, if you want. Just keep sipping and stay hydrated.[14]
Exercise at least 3 times per week. Regular exercise helps you sweat out toxins, clears your pores, and improves blood circulation, all of which will give you a healthy glow. Try to exercise for 30-60 minutes at least 3 times a week. You can swim, do zumba, lift weights, jog, do yoga, or engage in any other kind of physical activity you like. Find something that is fun, but still challenging.[15]
Aim for 7-8 hours of sleep each night. A full night’s rest will keep your skin looking great, and can actually help prevent wrinkles! If you want to look naturally beautiful, be sure to get 7-8 hours of sleep each night. It’s not called “beauty rest” for nothing![16]
Smile and project confidence. A smile is a beautiful thing! Smiling at people attracts them to you, and also helps you feel happier. Even if you don’t feel confident, you can still act like you do. Use good posture—stand up straight and avoid crossing your arms or fidgeting. Look people in the eye, shake hands firmly, and speak slowly and clearly.[17]
